City of McAllen Job Opportunities

Visit the City of McAllen's Online Jobs Portal! You can now apply online by clicking on the job title you are interested in and clicking on the "Apply" link!

Read More




Unified Development Code

The City of McAllen is updating its development ordinances with a new Unified Development Code. Click here to see the proposal and make any comments to planning@mcallen.net
